    • Uses of IndexUpdater in org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema

      Classes in org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema that implement IndexUpdater 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CollectingIndexUpdater
      Collects updates from CollectingIndexUpdater.process(IndexEntryUpdate) and passes them to the CollectingIndexUpdater.Applier on CollectingIndexUpdater.close().
      class  DeferredConflictCheckingIndexUpdater
      This deferring conflict checker solves e.g. a problem of applying updates to an index that is aware of, and also prevents, duplicates while applying.
